alert.note: Alert for La Crosse (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 11:01PM CDT until May 19 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LA CROSSE COUNTY... At 1101 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Salem, or 7 miles northeast of La Crosse, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Bangor around 1110 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include North Side Of La Crosse, The Valley View Mall, The Coulee Experimental Forest, Highway 162 And County E E, Rockland, Blue Bird Campground and Middle Ridge. This includes Interstate 90 in Wisconsin between mile markers 3 and 20. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
